input.sentences: all the bright lights of the fair are exciting .
this won the blue prize ribbon for best architectural design .
the spinning racer is a thrill seekers paradise .
as you plummet down it almost takes your breath away .
output.sentences: The county fair had a bright and colorful Ferris wheel.
The sign is turned on for the fair goers.
You can see the neighborhood from the highest point of this ride.
The racer roller coaster seems to be the funnest ride here.
A person takes a picture as they are climbing up the roller coaster hill.
